even <S%G5618>as<s%> the <S%G5207>Son<s%> of <S%G444>man<s%> <S%G2064>came<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> to be ministered <S%G1247>unto<s%>, <S%G235>but<s%> to <S%G1247>minister<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> to <S%G1325>give<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G5590>life<s%> a <S%G3083>ransom<s%> <S%G473>for<s%> <S%G4183>many<s%>.
